title: 4 Steps for Getting Over a DevOps Plateau
author: Andy Corrigan
description: The steps needed to level up in a challenging video game are very similar to what you'll need to do to rev up your DevOps journey.
cntitle: 克服 DevOps 瓶颈的 4 个步骤
cndescription: 在具有挑战性的视频游戏中升级所需的步骤与提升 DevOps 之旅所需的步骤非常相似。
